Package org.apache.jena.fuseki.ctl

Class ActionCtl

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • org.apache.jena.fuseki.servlets.ServletProcessor
          • org.apache.jena.fuseki.ctl.ActionCtl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig, ActionLifecycle, ActionProcessor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionContainerItem, ActionMetrics, ActionSleep, ActionTasks
    public abstract class ActionCtl
extends ServletProcessor
implements ActionLifecycle
    Base class for control actions. These are servlets and do not go through Fuseki dynamic dispatch. No statistics.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
